vote.title: Reappointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the reappointment of Mr. Chris Hannan, representing the Los Angeles County Federation of Labor, AFL-CIO, as member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing May 20, 2021. The Board has determined that Mr. Hannan is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
